mapper.select: and (b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{kwd} ,'%') or b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{kwd} ,'%')) order by b.group_no desc , b.order_no asc LIMIT #{pager.pageStart} , #{pager.pageNum}
order by b.group_no desc , b.order_no asc LIMIT ${pageStart-1} , #{pageNum}
